channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Found by OR DOT with two manway swing bolts less than tool tight and 1/2-gallon release of product. Car was assessed and gasket visible, manway secured, product had evaporated, and staining remained. Car released into transportation.

item.title: Report X-2024101520
item.description:
Report X-2024101520

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-25T09:22:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-10
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: EXTERNAL PACKAGING FAILED, CONTENTS CAME LOOSE FROM CARTON. PACKAGE WAS NOT ADEQUATELY PREPAED FOR SHIPMENT OF HAZARDOUS MATERIALS, FLAMMABLE SOLID, INORGANIC, N.O.S. REWRAP; PACKAGE WAS LEAKED ON BY ANOTHER PACKAGE IN THE SORT; NO DAMAGE TO SPARKLERS
